name: Discord Moderation Bot
author: jjakesv870@gmail.com
description: Node.js Discord moderation bot with global slash commands. Auto-update enabled with version.txt.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update && apt install -y curl wget
cd /mnt/server
npm install discord.js
VERSIONS_URL="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jjakesv/premadebots/refs/heads/main/versions.txt"
BOT_FILE="moderation-bot.js"
LATEST_VER=$(curl -s $VERSIONS_URL | grep "${BOT_FILE}==" | cut -d'=' -f3)
[ -z "$LATEST_VER" ] && LATEST_VER="1.0.0"
curl -o bot.js https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jjakesv/premadebots/refs/heads/main/$BOT_FILE || wget -O bot.js https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jjakesv/premadebots/refs/heads/main/$BOT_FILE
echo "$LATEST_VER" > version.txt
exit 0
